chargerIds.title: Charger IDs
chargerIds.description: The unique identifiers of the chargers

ChargersLastUsed.description: The object used to find the last EV transactions on specific chargers

ids.title: EV transaction IDs
ids.description: The EV transaction IDs to search for

items.title: EV transaction IDs
items.description: The EV transaction IDs to search for

fromDate.title: From date
fromDate.description: The start date for the search, in epoch time

toDate.title: To date
toDate.description: The end date for the search, in epoch time

evseId.title: EVSE ID
evseId.description: The unique identifier of the EVSE

transactionBillingStatus.title: Transaction billing status
transactionBillingStatus.description: The billing status of the transaction. This will always be FINAL_COST.

EvTransactionFilter.description: The filter object used to search for EV transactions

id.title: EV transaction ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the EV transaction

currency.title: Currency
currency.description:
The currency of the transaction. Options are:
* USD
* EUR
* GBP
* NIS
* HUF
* CZK
* RON
* HRK
* SEK
* NOK
* SKK
* CLP
* COP
* JPY
* ISK
* INR
* NZD
* DKK
* CAD
* AED
* CHF
* PLN
* RUB
* AUD
* BGN
* THB
* MXN

totalTax.title: Total tax
totalTax.description: The total tax amount for the transaction

total.title: Total amount
total.description: The total amount charged for the transaction

totalForEnergy.title: Total for energy
totalForEnergy.description: The total amount charged for energy consumed in this transaction

totalForTime.title: Total for time
totalForTime.description: The total amount charged for hours/minutes charged in this transaction

totalReservationFee.title: Reservation fee
totalReservationFee.description: The total amount charged for reservations

totalOvertimePenalty.title: Total overtime penalty
totalOvertimePenalty.description: The total amount charged for overtime penalties

totalWithDiscount.title: Total with discount
totalWithDiscount.description: The total amount charged for the transaction after discounts are applied

ChargerStatusFilter.description: The filter object used to search for charger status details

cardId.title: Card ID
cardId.description: The unique identifier of the RFID card

reason.title: Reason
reason.description:
The reason for sending the remote start command. Options are:
* PAY_PER_USE
* NO_CARD_YET
* FORGOT_CARD
* COURTESY_FREE_CHARGE
* CARD_DOES_NOT_WORK
* ISSUE_WITH_CARD_READER
* CHARGER_WONT_RELEASE_THE_HANDLE
* ISSUE_WITH_CHARGER

cardId.title: Card ID
cardId.description: The unique identifier of the RFID card

reason.title: Reason
reason.description:
The reason for stopping charging. Options are:
* MAX_CHARGE_DURATION_REACHED
* GIREVE_METER_LIMIT_REACHED
* CONCURRENT_CHARGING
* MAX_CHARGE_KWH_REACHED
* BEFORE_RESERVATION
* EMERGENCY_STOP

id.title: EV transaction ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the EV transaction

connectorStatus.title: Connector status
connectorStatus.description:
The connector status. Options are:
* AVAILABLE
* CHARGING
* FAULTED
* UNAVAILABLE
* NEW
* UNKNOWN
* RESERVED
* DISCHARGING
* PAUSED
* PREPARING
* FINISHING

connectorType.title: Connector type
connectorType.description:
The connector type. Options are:
* TYPE_2_MENNEKES
* TYPE_4_CHADEMO
* TYPE_F_SCHUKO_CEE_7_4_GER
* TYPE_E_AND_F_CEE_7_5_FRA
* TYPE_3_SCAME
* TYPE_COMBO_GERMANY
* TYPE_K_SECTION_107_2_D1_DEN
* TYPE_C_CEE7_16_EU
* TYPE_E_CEE_7_5_FRA
* TYPE_C_CEE_7_17_GER_FRA
* TYPE_L_CEI_23_16_VII_ITA
* TYPE_J_SEV_1011_CH
* TYPE_D_BS_546_2_PIN_UK
* TYPE_D_BS_546_3_PIN_UK
* TYPE_G_BS_1363_IS_401_AND_411_MS_58_UK
* TYPE_1_J1772_YAZAKI
* SAE_J1772_COMBO_US
* SAE_J1772_AVCON
* TESLA_UNIVERSAL_MOBILE_CONNECTOR
* NEMA_1_15P
* TYPE_B_NEMA_5_15
* TYPE_B_NEMA_5_20
* TESLA_R
* TESLA_S
* TYPE_2_TETHERED

transactionStatus.title: Transaction status
transactionStatus.description:
The transaction status. Options are:
* STARTED
* UPDATED
* STOPPED
* BILLED

transactionBillingStatus.title: Transaction billing status
transactionBillingStatus.description:
The billing status of the transaction. Options are:
* NOT_BILLABLE
* TEMP_COST
* FINAL_COST
* DICTATED_COST
* EXCEEDED_BILLING_CALC_TIME_RANGE
* FREE_CHARGE

stopReason.title: Stop reason
stopReason.description:
The reason the transaction was stopped. Options are:
* EMERGENCY_STOP
* EV_DISCONNECTED
* HARD_RESET
* LOCAL
* OTHER
* POWER_LOSS
* REBOOT
* REMOTE
* SOFT_RESET
* UNLOCK_COMMAND
* DE_AUTHORIZED
* ENERGY_LIMIT_REACHED
* GROUND_FAULT
* IMMEDIATE_RESET
* MASTER_PASS
* LOCAL_OUT_OF_CREDIT
* OVERCURRENT_FAULT
* POWER_QUALITY
* SOC_LIMIT_REACHED
* STOPPED_BY_EV
* TIME_LIMIT_REACHED
* TIMEOUT
* MANUAL_STOP_CHARGE_BY_OPERATOR
* CONCURRENT_CHARGING
* BEFORE_RESERVATION

corruptedReasons.title: Corrupted reasons
corruptedReasons.description: The reasons for a corrupted transaction

items.title: Corrupted reasons
items.description: The reasons for a corrupted transaction

planId.title: Plan ID
planId.description: The unique identifier of the plan

connectorId.title: Connector ID
connectorId.description: The unique identifier of the connector

meterReadOnStart.title: Meter read on start
meterReadOnStart.description: The meter reading when the transaction started

meterReadOnStop.title: Meter read on stop
meterReadOnStop.description: The meter reading when the transaction stopped

smart.title: Smart
smart.description: Indicates whether smart charging was used

startedOn.title: Started on
startedOn.description: The start date the transaction, in epoch time

stoppedOn.title: Stopped on
stoppedOn.description: The end date the transaction, in epoch time

chargeTime.title: Charge time
chargeTime.description: The amount of time the vehicle was charging, in epoch time

plugTimeInSeconds.title: Plug time
plugTimeInSeconds.description: The amount of time the vehicle was connected to the charger but not charging, in seconds

chargeEnergySupplyTimeInSeconds.title: Charger energy supply
chargeEnergySupplyTimeInSeconds.description: The amount of time the charger supplied energy to the vehicle, in seconds

chargerId.title: Charger ID
chargerId.description: The unique identifier of the charger

vehicleSoc.title: Vehicle SoC
vehicleSoc.description: The state of charge of the vehicle

planCode.title: Plan code
planCode.description: The unique name of the plan

cardId.title: Card ID
cardId.description: The unique identifier of the card used to start the transaction

cardType.title: Card type
cardType.description: The type of card used to start the transaction

totalChargingTime.title: Total charging time
totalChargingTime.description: The time charged, in milli seconds

totalEnergy.title: Total energy
totalEnergy.description: The total amount of energy consumed in this transaction

tariffId.title: Tariff ID
tariffId.description: The unique identifier of the tariff

chargerPublicKey.title: Charger public key
chargerPublicKey.description: The public key of the charger

startMeterSignedData.title: Start meter signed data
startMeterSignedData.description: The meter reading when the transaction started, as signed data

stopMeterSignedData.title: Stop meter signed data
stopMeterSignedData.description: The meter reading when the transaction stopped, as signed data

reservationId.title: Reservation ID
reservationId.description: The unique identifier of the reservation

evseId.title: EVSE ID
evseId.description: The unique identifier of the EVSE

authorizationFailureReason.title: Authorization failure reason
authorizationFailureReason.description: The reason for the authorization failure

accepted.title: Accepted
accepted.description: Indicates whether the transaction was accepted

transactionUuid.title: Billing transaction UUID
transactionUuid.description: The unique ID of the billing transaction

startSource.title: Start source
startSource.description: The source of the start transaction command

stopSource.title: Stop source
stopSource.description: The source of the stop transaction command

id.title: Charger ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the charger

externalId.title: External ID
externalId.description: The unique identifier of the charger from an external source

chargerStatus.title: Charger status
chargerStatus.description:
The charger status. Options are:
* AVAILABLE
* OCCUPIED
* FAULTED
* UNAVAILABLE
* NEW
* UNKNOWN
* RESERVED
* IN_PROVISION
* CHARGING
* DISCHARGING
* PAUSED
* PREPARING
* FINISHING

temperatureScale.title: Temperature scale
temperatureScale.description:
The temperature scale. Options are:
* CELSIUS
* FAHRENHEIT

errorCode.title: Error code
errorCode.description:
The error on the charger. Options are:
* OTHER_ERROR
* CONNECTOR_LOCK_FAILURE
* HIGH_TEMPERATURE
* MODE_3_ERROR
* NO_ERROR
* POWER_METER_FAILURE
* POWER_SWITCH_FAILURE
* READER_FAILURE
* EV_COMMUNICATION_ERROR
* GROUND_FAILURE
* INTERNAL_ERROR
* LOCAL_LIST_CONFLICT
* OVER_CURRENT_FAILURE
* OVER_VOLTAGE
* RESET_FAILURE
* UNDER_VOLTAGE
* WEAK_SIGNAL

provisionStatus.title: Provisioning status
provisionStatus.description:
The provisioning status of the charger. Options are:
* ORDERED
* IN_STOCK
* READY_FOR_INSTALLATION
* INSTALLED
* CONNECTED
* READY_FOR_PROVISIONING
* PROVISIONED
* SCHEDULED_FOR_DECOMMISSIONING
* DECOMMISSIONED
* DENETWORKED
* IN_CONSTRUCTION
* IN_INSTALLATION

firmwareVersion.title: Firmware version
firmwareVersion.description: The firmware version installed on the charger

currentTemperature.title: Current temperature
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature of the charger

installationDate.title: Installation date
installationDate.description: The date that the charger was installed, in epoch time

updateStatus.title: Update status
updateStatus.description:
The update status of the firmware. Options are:
* INACTIVE
* PLANNED
* PENDING
* DOWNLOADED
* DOWNLOAD_FAILED
* INSTALLED
* INSTALLATION_FAILED
* REQUEST_TIMED_OUT
* DOWNLOADING
* INSTALLING
* DOWNLOAD_SCHEDULED
* DOWNLOAD_PAUSED
* INSTALL_REBOOTING
* INSTALL_SCHEDULED
* INSTALL_VERIFICATION_FAILED
* INVALID_SIGNATURE
* SIGNATURE_VERIFIED
* PUBLISH_FAILED

provisioningDate.title: Provisioned date
provisioningDate.description: The date that the charger was provisioned, in epoch time

decommissionDate.title: Decommissioned date
decommissionDate.description: The date that the charger was decomissioned, in epoch time

groupIds.title: Group IDs
groupIds.description: The IDs of groups that include this charger

items.title: Group IDs
items.description: The IDs of groups that include this charger

siteId.title: Site ID
siteId.description: The unique identifier of the site

errorCode.title: Error code
errorCode.description: The error that occurred. The value is NO_ERROR if no error occurred.

errorMessage.title: Error message
errorMessage.description: A free text field with more information about the error

estimated.description: The estimated amount of the transaction

id.description: The unique identifier of the charger host

id.description: The unique identifier of the EVSE

id.description: The unique identifier of the connector

identityKey.description: The identity key of the charger, which is used by the system to communicate with it

evseConnectorIdentityKey.description: The identifier of the connector. The identifier is unique only within the charger.

serialNumber.title: Serial number
serialNumber.description: The serial number of the connector

legacyId.title: Legacy ID
legacyId.description: The legacy ID of the connector

externalId.description: The identifier of the connector from an external source

meterSerialNumber.title: Meter serial number
meterSerialNumber.description: The serial number of the meter

utilityMeterNumber.title: Utility meter serial number
utilityMeterNumber.description: The serial number of the utility meter

ignoreStatusNotification.title: Ignore status notification
ignoreStatusNotification.description: Indicates whether status notifications from the connector are ignored

status.title: Connector status
status.description:
The connector status. Options are:
* AVAILABLE
* CHARGING
* FAULTED
* UNAVAILABLE
* NEW
* UNKNOWN
* RESERVED
* DISCHARGING
* PAUSED
* PREPARING
* FINISHING

reservable.title: Reservable
reservable.description: Indicates whether the connector can be reserved

revenueMargin.title: Revenue margin
revenueMargin.description: The profit margin of the connector. This is for information only.

teslaConnectionType.title: Tesla connection type
teslaConnectionType.description:
The type of Tesla connection, if there is one. Options are:
* NONE
* ADAPTER
* CONNECTOR

teslaAdapterSerialNumber.title: Tesla adapter serial number
teslaAdapterSerialNumber.description: The serial number of the Tesla adapter

teslaAdapterInstallationDate.title: Tesla adapter installation date
teslaAdapterInstallationDate.description: The date the Tesla adapter was installed, in epoch time

teslaAdapterInMaintenance.title: Tesla adapter in maintenance
teslaAdapterInMaintenance.description: Indicates whether the Tesla adapter is in maintenance

teslaHasAdapter.title: Tesla adapter
teslaHasAdapter.description: Indicates whether the connector has a Tesla adaptor

inMaintenance.title: In maintenance
inMaintenance.description: Indicates whether the connector is in maintenance

smartChargingEnabled.title: Smart charging enabled
smartChargingEnabled.description: Indicates whether the connector supports smart charging

wiredPhase.title: Wired phase
wiredPhase.description: The number of the wired phase for a single-phase charger/connector

errorCode.title: Error code
errorCode.description:
The error on the connector. Options are:
* OTHER_ERROR
* CONNECTOR_LOCK_FAILURE
* HIGH_TEMPERATURE

* NO_ERROR
* POWER_METER_FAILURE
* POWER_SWITCH_FAILURE

posChargingStatus.title: POS charging status
posChargingStatus.description:
The charging status of the connector at the point of sale. Options are:
* NONE
* STARTING
* CHARGING
* STOPPING

errorMessage.title: Error message
errorMessage.description: A free text field with more information about the error message

placement.title: Placement
placement.description:
The placement of the connector on the charger. Options are:
* NOT_SPECIFIED
* LEFT
* RIGHT
* TOP
* BOTTOM
* CENTER

ratedFrequency.title: Rated frequency
ratedFrequency.description: The frequency at which the connector is designed to operate

ratedVoltage.title: Rated voltage
ratedVoltage.description: The maximum voltage that the connector can operate at safely

qrCode.title: QR code
qrCode.description: The URL for the website where the driver can swipe to start charging

cableLength.title: QR code
cableLength.description: The URL for the website where the driver can swipe to start charging
